definition: the topmost projecting part of an entablature, to furnish with a cornice
details:
noun
- the topmost projecting part of an entablature
- a molding at the corner between the ceiling and the top of a wall
- a decorative framework to conceal curtain fixtures at the top of a window casing
= synonyms: valance, valance board, pelmet
verb
- to furnish with a cornice
